# Erc721.getOwnedTokenIds() method

Get all token ids of NFTs owned by a specific wallet.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOwnedTokenIds(walletAddress?: AddressOrEns): Promise<BigNumber[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                                  | Description                                                                |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| walletAddress | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) | _(Optional)_ the wallet address to query, defaults to the connected wallet |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BigNumber\[\]&gt;
